parameters.name: CasterId
parameters.description: The ID of the production studio. It is included in the response when you call the [CreateCaster](~~69338#doc-api-live-CreateCaster~~ "Creates a production studio.") operation.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: EpisodeType
parameters.description:
The type of the episode. Valid values:

*   **Resource**: a video resource.
*   **Component**: a component.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the episode. Valid values:

*   **0**: The episode has not been played.
*   **1**: The episode is being played.
*   **2**: The episode has been played.
